sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you:
dataTypes: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data (pages visited, time spent, features used)

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content:
Your information helps us deliver and improve our educational services:
  • To provide and maintain our coding programs
  • To process payments and enrollment
  • To personalize your learning experience
  • To monitor program effectiveness
  • To communicate important updates

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures including:
  • SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
  • Regular security audits
  • Limited access to personal data
  • Secure payment processing

sections.title: Third-Party Sharing
sections.content:
We only share your data with trusted third parties when necessary:
  • Payment processors to complete transactions
  • Cloud service providers for data storage
  • Analytics providers to improve our services
We never sell your personal data to third parties.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the right to:
  • Access your personal data
  • Request correction of inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Withdraw consent for data processing
  • Receive your data in a portable format

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:
  • Authenticate users and maintain sessions
  • Remember user preferences
  • Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through email or prominent website notices. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
